text: Hulak is the surname of the following people *Derek Hulak (born 1989), Canadian ice hockey defenceman *Krunoslav Hulak (1951–2015), Croatian chess master *Mykola Hulak (1821–1899), Ukrainian political and cultural activist, journalist, scientist, interpreter and lawyer *Semen Hulak-Artemovsky (1813–1873), Ukrainian opera composer, singer, actor and dramatist
title: Hulak
